overview: In a small money transfer agency based in Milan, people send money to their family in homeland. The camera watches and listen silently giving the start for an archive of metropolitan stories. Spanish and Italian are melted together, time and space are alternated and a smile come from the boredom. A tiny space lived by episodes that are together the reflection of an entire community into another. Lima is not that far.
tagline: In a small money transfer agency based in Milan, people send money to their family in homeland.
title: Lima, Lima
